body.name: LUCID 10 Inch Memory Foam Mattress - Firm Feel - Bamboo Charcoal and Gel Infusion - Hypoallergenic - Bed in a Box - Temperature Regulating - Pressure Relief - Breathable - Full Size
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: MATTRESS IN A BOX AND ARRIVES COMPRESSED: Your memory foam mattress is compressed, rolled, and arrives in a box right to your doorstep; mattress will expand more quickly in a warm room, but please allow 24-72 hours for mattress for full expansion

BAMBOO CHARCOAL AND GEL INFUSIONS: This comfortable memory foam mattress is infused with cooling gel to help you sleep cooler and bamboo charcoal to help capture odors to keep your bed fresh all day every day
PRESSURE RELIEVING MEMORY FOAM: This all-foam mattress has layers of comfort foam and memory foam that contour to your shape and align the spine for pressure relieving comfort all night long

THREE FEELS TO ACCOMMODATE ALL SLEEP STYLES: With a standard 10-inch profile and three different feels, this mattress is great for all sleep styles; a firm feel is perfect for stomach sleepers and those with back pain

RELIABLE AND QUALITY COMFORT: CertiPUR-US Certified to meet the highest quality standards, this mattress has a 10-year limited warranty and can be relied on to provide comfort for all your loved ones through every stage of life
body.description: The Lucid 10 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress is the perfect choice for back and stomach sleepers looking for a Full mattress for their full bed. A combined 2.5-inch layer of ventilated gel memory foam and a 7.5-inch layer of high-density support foam gives the bed a FIRM feel. 6.5 inches of dense foam, infused with bamboo charcoal, act as a stable support. Plus, the bamboo charcoal infusion helps keep your mattress smelling fresh thanks to its natural hypoallergenic properties.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Do not wash. Do not use bleach. Do not machine dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean., DO NOT REMOVE OR WASH COVER: Spot clean only, vacuum your mattress, sprinkle some baking soda on it. Use a scrub brush to gently rub the powder into the mattress and leave it for 10 minutes and vacuum the excess powder.

productInformation.value: Crafted with soft, cooling, hypoallergenic, moisture-wicking materials, this premium mattress ensures ultimate night's sleep by offering pressure relief and enhanced breathability. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The ventilated design increases airflow through the memory foam layer, helping to create a breathable and comfortable sleep environment. LUCID mattresses are compressed, rolled, and shipped in an easy-to-manage box for convenient shipping and simple setup. This product is certified to the highest performance and safety standards to ensure uncompromising comfort and protection for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very firm mattress
reviews.reviewText: The long twin fits my 6'2" son perfectly as he needed more of the length than the width, not much of a roller when sleeping. Gets to sleep faster and very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use in guest room and all my guest love it! Great price for a quality mattress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeps comfortably it is what it says it was.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a full size - medium - 10 in - for one of our guest bedrooms. My mother In law just came for Thanksgiving and slept in the room and she said it was a super comfy and fell right asleep with zero issues. She is now ordering one for herself.After we purchased I let it deflate for a day. It rose to its full capacity. I also have slept on this to test it out and it’s perfect if you like your bed medium firm. This was a smart and good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s almost perfect
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased the plush Lucid mattress for my other house & that one was PERFECT. Needed another mattress & for some reason could not ship the plush to Hawaii. But the medium mattress could be shipped, so I went with that. If you are reading this then you know mattresses are a very personal choice. How can a mattress feel like sleeping in a cloud & also feel like sleeping on a slab of concrete? Is there truly that much difference in 2 people’s experience? Or is it quality control of the memory foam? At any rate, I had a good experience with Lucid once. And had a bad experience with a different brand where the new mattress had zero support & gave me back pain like I’ve never experienced before. It also was so hot! And if you get the mattress & don’t like it, good luck getting it back into the box & returning it! I ended up selling it to some poor soul that didn’t know what a torture thing the mattress was. But hey, there were a gazillion 5 star reviews on that brand. Maybe the buyer got an almost brand new “like sleeping on a cloud in an inferno” for a fraction of the price!Anyways, back to this medium support Lucid. It’s OK. I wake up with ZERO back pain & does not retain heat, so maybe it does deserve a 5 star instead of 4 star. But, I just wish it had a tad bit more softness. Like maybe one or two more inches of soft memory foam. I’ve had it for a couple months. I am hoping as it breaks in it will soften up a bit. This mattress is probably good for people larger than I. And I sleep alone with a couple little furry friends. I tried putting a 3” memory foam mattress topper on it but it was too much, a little too soft. Maybe a 1” or 2” topper will work. Don’t get me wrong, I really do like this mattress. No back pain is worth a lot!!! This mattress is almost perfect! I would have traded the plush for this medium, but he let the old dog sleep on it with no waterproof protection & guess what? He can keep it! Also, the softer they are the faster they degrade. That plush mattress… the person sleeping on it is about 30-40lbs heavier than me. He’s been sleeping on it for 5 years & its has an indentation where he sleeps. But he has not complained about that. He does complain about the fact that there’s no support at the edges when you sit. That is true for any memory foam mattress. He ended up putting padded side boards on his bed frame to give it support (my bed frame already has side boards, which is perfect for memory foam!) I really wish I could have ordered the plush Lucid, even if I would have to replace it in 5 years. For the price, to me, it’s worth it. That plush mattress was perfect, this medium is almost perfect & since it is firmer, hopefully it will last a little longer. Good luck with the search for the perfect mattress! If you can afford to pay a little more, buy one at Costco or somewhere that you can return it if it doesn’t work for you. Or go to a mattress store & take a lie down on different brands. Or lie down on a friend’s memory foam & see how it feels. There’s just no way to know, since every mattress on Amazon has contradictory reviews. I do believe that if you are not sure, go with the firmer one. If it’s too firm, you can always put a topper on it. But if it’s too soft & causes crippling pain & makes you feel like you are sleeping in an inferno of heat, you are pretty much screwed. I do recommend this medium Lucid mattress. It is a good mattress at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel like a high end mattress!
reviews.reviewText: I got the best night of sleep ever at an Airbnb and so I asked the owner where he got the mattress. He laughed and said that he gets that question a lot and that it was super inexpensive. He sent me this link and it was the best purchase ever! Seriously the most comfortable mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm is really firm
reviews.reviewText: Great bed but too firm for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy with one minor lesson learned!
reviews.reviewText: So my girlfriend had an old queen size box spring mattress that was in terrible shape. When we moved in together, we brought her bed with. The mattress kept getting worse and worse so we ended up going to both several chain and local mattress stores. The cheapest we could find for a basic queen size memory foam mattress was $700.We bought this, somewhat hesitant about buying an off brand mattress from Amazon. We left it to inflate for 4 days before sleeping on it and it was so comfy, not too hard and not too soft. Just right! We then put a plastic mattress protector/cover on the mattress to protect it from spills, etc.Shortly after that, we noticed the bed wasn’t very soft or comfy anymore, almost too hard. We thought that the mattress had finally showed it’s true colors and we were a little upset.On a whim, we removed the mattress protector/bag and all of a sudden, the mattress was super comfy again. Lesson learned!So don’t put a mattress protector on the mattress and it will be fine. Just don’t spill anything on it, although the mattress does have a cloth cover that goes over the foam that’s removable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Value… But Not Soft
reviews.reviewText: Full disclosure, I have previously slept on a partially deflated and incredibly smooshy Sleep Number bed for 20+ years so I’m probably not coming at this new mattress with a proper mindset! I like soft and cushy (soggy?) beds and I should have looked for something that was truly plush. That being said, we have a few of the Lucid mattresses at our lake home and they were great value for the money and have held up well. So this was a no brainer- the mattress arrived on time and I let it inflate and air out for about three days. No toxic odor or off gassing. Overall, it’s great, just not as soft as I would have liked. The word ‘plush’ isn’t really an accurate descriptor. I might buy a down feather bed topper and see if that helps. Other than that, the bed is good and I’m sleeping ok.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for hospital type bed frame!

reviews.reviewText: After staring at the box for a few months, I was finally able to redecorate my room and set up my new bed and this mattress. I love it, it's so comfy and I sleep well. My favorite part of the day is going to bed and watching TV to decompress after a hectic day!

It's hard to describe what it feels like when you lay on something like this, but the best thing I can think of is, it kinda feels like your floating when you lay on it. I'm a big guy who bought this for my big rig sleeper as the factory one was horrible. Couldn't get comfortable, always waking up with aches and pains, not having a good sleep at all! I've had this mattress for almost a week now and what a difference! Never laid on a mattress that felt like this! I like it!I'm just over 300lbs and when I lay on this thing, I sink in just enough. It's firm, but not hard. Just figured I'd let the bigger guys know that. Thanks again!
Bought for my 16 year old grand-daughter and she loves it.
